   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to pyrh's documentation!
================================

`pyrh` is the Cython compiled module of RH NLTE radiative transfer synthesize code. It is written for Python 3.6+ environments.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   quick_start
